issue.title: [Rust] build.rs is missing in the v3.0.0 package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11764](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11764). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems like the `build.rs` was not included in the package when devs were publishing the crate to crates.io. And that is why the `simd` feature no longer works.

Because in the 2.0.0 `#[cfg(all(..., feature = simd))]` attribute was used and in version 3.0.0 it was upgraded to `#[cfg(simd)]`.
